LanguageData.Hediffs_MovingLv1.description: Kinryoku (Muscle strength) Tip 1: Friendly reminder, different meals grant various amounts of experience.
LanguageData.Hediffs_MovingLv2.label: Muscle Conditioning Lv.2
LanguageData.Hediffs_MovingLv2.description: Kinryoku (Muscle strength) Tip 2: There are also processed foods that accumulate experience points even if the ability boost is not activated.
LanguageData.Hediffs_Moving.label: Muscle Conditioning
LanguageData.Hediffs_Moving.description: Kinryoku (Muscle strength): I eat with gratitude for all the ingredients in the world!\nKnowledge is power, and what better way to learn than to eat, eat, eat! Kanpai!
